item.pickybags.bag.tooltip: Storage size of a double chest
item.pickybags.lunchbox.tooltip: Picks up food for you; eat to consume contents; sneak to open
item.pickybags.pickup_rocks.tooltip: Collects stone and dirt related items into its own inventory
item.pickybags.pickup_trees.tooltip: Collects wood related items into its own inventory
item.pickybags.pickup_gems.tooltip: Collects ores and metals into its own inventory
item.pickybags.pickup_plants.tooltip: Collects seeds and plant related items into its own inventory
